title: VictorProsh
author: VictorProsh
content: The situation is as follows -There is a smart contract with parametersif ether is sent to his address in contact, he blocks it at the address in the smart contract, and in response to the address from which the ether came, he sends tokens that he generated. The ether will become available when the tokens return to the contract.Question? Can the address in the smart contract be a wallet address.
